# PostCSS Custom Selectors [<img src="DELETED_URL_WITH_CREDENTIALS"custom-selectors": { ":--heading": "h1, h2, h3" } }
    cachedObject,
    customProperties => {
      customProperties    // { ':--heading': 'h1, h2, h3' }
    }
  ]
});
```
